translations.translation: realising that a back-breaking blow has fallen.
Fearing that a great disaster is going to befall them.
believing that a crushing calamity is about to strike them.
certain of facing a great calamity.
Knowing that they will be subjected to a torment that breaks the backs.
Thinking that some calamity is about to fall on them.
Knowing that there will be made to befall them some great calamity.
thou mightest think the Calamity has been wreaked on them.
Thou wilt know that some great disaster is about to fall on them.
dreading some great affliction.
Imagining that there will befall them a waiste-breaking calomity.
knowing that they will be dealt out a punishment breaking the spine.
In the thought that some back-breaking calamity was about to be inflicted on them;
Thinking that some calamity was about to fall on them;
so they might think the Calamity had been inflicted upon them.
Realizing that a back-breaker has befallen them.
Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.
[75:25] certain that a spine-crushing calamity will fall on them, a great catastrophe, one that ‘crushes the spine’ (fiqār).
(Thou wilt know) those faces will know (that some great disaster is about to fall on them) a severe and horrible punishment is about to befall them.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ } معناهُ تَستيقنُ أنْ يُفعَلَ بِهَا دَاهِيةٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, {You think that they are a small thing, but they are a great thing} means that you think that what they are doing is unimportant, but it is actually very important.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: بحيث { تَظُنُّ } بل يجزم كلُّ من نظر إليها { أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا } ويعرض عليها { فَاقِرَةٌ } [القيامة: 25] داهية شديدة، ومصيبة عظيمة تكسر فقار ظهرها من هولها وشدتها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { تظن } أي: يتوقع أربابُها { أن يُفعل بها فاقِرة } أي: داهية عظيمة، تقصم فقار الظهر
